mapper.select: select employment_id, title, deadline, (referral_compensation + user_compensation) as compensation from employment where company_id = #{companyId}
select * from employment where company_id in (select company_id from company_tag where hashtag_name like #{companyTagName}) and employment_id != #{employmentId} limit #{count}
select if( exists( select * from employment where employment_id = #{employmentId} ), 1, 0)
select * from employment_image where employment_id = #{employmentId} limit 1

select employment_id, title, location, name as company_name, logo_image_url, (referral_compensation + user_compensation) as compensation, image_id, image_url from ((select employment_id, image_id from employment_image group by employment_id) as e_image left outer join image using(image_id) left outer join employment using(employment_id) left outer join company using(company_id)) where employment_id = #{employmentId}
